We have been learning to code for 3years. We Only Have 2 Members in this Team (Josh Me) (Pepsi) Couple of Releases We Have Made On MoparScape. https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,647373.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,647808.0.html We Currently Working for a Team Called IdealWebSoultions. Website creating php/Html - Setting up CPanel for Customers. We Want to offer are Help to you guys that would love to run a server or need help on there online server maybe ingame content or Website Sites. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Contact us Skype:Haviland41 Email:Deathlyscapev2@hotmail.com ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Feel free to Contact us We are Two TimeZones - USA & UK! [img]http://eypic.net/images/bannerwiw.gif[/img] [img]http:// [/img] [img]http://www.godzhell.com/banner.gif[/img] [img]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/8612/38186990.png[/img] Thanks Josh[/b][/center]

item.title: RSX Server & Site Creators 2013 September
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:7, topic:529272”][quote author=haviland4 link=topic=648028.msg4358696#msg4358696 date=1378227139]

You’re not organising payments through moparscape, you’ve been around long enough to know that’s against the rules here. Also judging by that site I wouldn’t be paying for you guys, even though I played RXS a while back, before anyone knew me here. If the java is anything like that site then I honestly don’t think you should be selling your programming services.

I’ve edited it out of your OP, if you don’t do free work don’t advertise it here. Also, you claim to be website developers working for a company yet you’ve included HTML code inside your BB code to include an image? Lol.

[b]yes i understand and im very sorry thanks for doing this and i will ask idealwebsoutions to send me a email for proof.

Thanks Josh[/b]
[/quote]
It doesn’t matter if they send proof, looking at the evidence here you’re just not experienced enough to freelance website development. Believe me, I freelanced for years upon years, if you presented that in a freelancing community you wouldn’t get anything but a terrible reputation. That’s just the truth of the matter.

Also, why would you use php over much better languages and web frameworks?[/quote]

ok i will offer my help for free i dont mind doing some work i have a couple of days.
i will remove the information for you.

Read full topic

item.title: RSX Server & Site Creators 2013 September
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:6, topic:529272”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=648028.msg4358692#msg4358692 date=1378226577]
You’re not organising payments through moparscape, you’ve been around long enough to know that’s against the rules here. Also judging by that site I wouldn’t be paying for you guys, even though I played RXS a while back, before anyone knew me here. If the java is anything like that site then I honestly don’t think you should be selling your programming services.

I’ve edited it out of your OP, if you don’t do free work don’t advertise it here. Also, you claim to be website developers working for a company yet you’ve included HTML code inside your BB code to include an image? Lol.
[/quote]

[b]yes i understand and im very sorry thanks for doing this and i will ask idealwebsoutions to send me a email for proof.

Thanks Josh[/b][/quote]
It doesn’t matter if they send proof, looking at the evidence here you’re just not experienced enough to freelance website development. Believe me, I freelanced for years upon years, if you presented that in a freelancing community you wouldn’t get anything but a terrible reputation. That’s just the truth of the matter.

Also, why would you use php over much better languages and web frameworks?

Read full topic
